A 4th Hour Project by: Jacob Strain

  • FNAF: A movie about animatronics coming to life.
  • John Wick: Chapter 4: A movie about John Wick against the High Table.
  • 65: A movie about a guy that gets sent to the prehistoric age.
  • The Nun 2: A movie about a possessed demon nun.
  • Insidious: The Red Door: A movie about a kid's dreams truning into a living nightmare.
  • Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse: A movie about spiderman traveling across spider verses.
  • Ghost Rider: A movie about a man who can turn into just bones and set himself ablaze.
  • Cocaine Bear: A movie about a bear finding abandoned cocaine.
  • Meg 2: The Trench: A movie about a megalodon attacking deep sea divers.
  • Transformers: Rise Of The Beast: A movie about transformers the look like animals fight with the transformers as one.
  • Expendables 4: A movie about a group of men that are the world's last line of defense.
  • Extraction 2: A movie about a man who embarks on a dangerous mission to save a ruthless gangster's imprisoned family.
